Title: Relates to criminal possession of stolen property
Summary: Authorizes the court where there is criminal possession of stolen property to, in its discretion release the principal pending trial on the principal's own recognizance or under non-monetary conditions, fix bail, or order non-monetary conditions in conjunction with fixing bail, or, where the defendant is charged with a qualifying offense which is a felony, the court may commit the principal to the custody of the sheriff; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to criminal possession of stolen property
